sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtstrsmrcvlogsummary ( OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE /* */ , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* */ , PROVD_SYS_ID /* */ , PROVD_SVC_ID /* */ , REQUST_INSTT_ID /* */ , REQUST_SYS_ID /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , ERROR_CO /* */ ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# /* */ , #trsmrcvSeCode# /* */ , #provdInsttId# /* */ , #provdSysId# /* */ , #provdSvcId# /* */ , #requstInsttId# /* */ , #requstSysId# /* */ , #rdcnt# /* */ , #errorCo# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtstrsmrcvlogsummary SET OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE=#trsmrcvSeCode# /* */ , PROVD_INSTT_ID=#provdInsttId# /* */ , PROVD_SYS_ID=#provdSysId# /* */ , PROVD_SVC_ID=#provdSvcId# /* */ , REQUST_INSTT_ID=#requstInsttId# /* */ , REQUST_SYS_ID=#requstSysId# /* */ , RDCNT=#rdcnt# /* */ , ERROR_CO=#errorCo# /* */ WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND TRSMRCV_SE_CODE=#trsmrcvSeCode# /* */ AND PROVD_INSTT_ID=#provdInsttId# /* */ AND PROVD_SYS_ID=#provdSysId# /* */ AND PROVD_SVC_ID=#provdSvcId# /* */ AND REQUST_INSTT_ID=#requstInsttId# /* */ AND REQUST_SYS_ID=#requstSysId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtstrsmrcvlogsummary WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND TRSMRCV_SE_CODE=#trsmrcvSeCode# /* */ AND PROVD_INSTT_ID=#provdInsttId# /* */ AND PROVD_SYS_ID=#provdSysId# /* */ AND PROVD_SVC_ID=#provdSvcId# /* */ AND REQUST_INSTT_ID=#requstInsttId# /* */ AND REQUST_SYS_ID=#requstSysId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE /* */ , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* */ , PROVD_SYS_ID /* */ , PROVD_SVC_ID /* */ , REQUST_INSTT_ID /* */ , REQUST_SYS_ID /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , ERROR_CO /* */ FROM comtstrsmrcvlogsummary WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND TRSMRCV_SE_CODE=#trsmrcvSeCode# /* */ AND PROVD_INSTT_ID=#provdInsttId# /* */ AND PROVD_SYS_ID=#provdSysId# /* */ AND PROVD_SVC_ID=#provdSvcId# /* */ AND REQUST_INSTT_ID=#requstInsttId# /* */ AND REQUST_SYS_ID=#requstSysId# /* */

SELECT OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE /* */ , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* */ , PROVD_SYS_ID /* */ , PROVD_SVC_ID /* */ , REQUST_INSTT_ID /* */ , REQUST_SYS_ID /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , ERROR_CO /* */ FROM comtstrsmrcvlogsummary WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword# /* */
TRSMRCV_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DE DESC /* */ , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE DESC /* */ , PROVD_INSTT_ID DESC /* */ , PROVD_SYS_ID DESC /* */ , PROVD_SVC_ID DESC /* */ , REQUST_INSTT_ID DESC /* */ , REQUST_SYS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtstrsmrcvlogsummary WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword# /* */
TRSMRCV_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
